header.title: Join or Lead a Project
header.subtitle: Lightweight proposal | Fast review | Open collaboration

eligibility.title: Eligibility & Alignment
eligibility.description: Anyone can participate or lead as long as the project aligns with our core objectives in Research, Education, or Consultations.
requirements: Clear objective mapped to Research, Education, or Consultations
Data lifecycle plan (acquisition -> curation -> visualization -> modeling)
Open-source or open-access preference for outputs

cta.title: Open Collaboration
cta.description: Share a brief description of the idea you would like to implement. Move the conversation to GitHub so ideas, context, and follow-ups stay transparent to the whole community.
highlights: Start threads with context, attachments, and checklists.
Mention mentors or subject-matter leads for quicker reviews.
Link commits, issues, or datasets to keep execution traceable.
cta.note: Need help drafting your idea? Email us or open a draft discussion - a maintainer will jump in with guidance.
